verses.verse: Therefore <S%G5124><s%> seeing <S%G1223><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> ministry, <S%G1248><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> we obtained mercy, <S%G1653><s%> we don't <S%G3756><s%> faint. <S%G1573><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> we have renounced <S%G550><s%> the hidden things <S%G2927><s%> of shame, <S%G152><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> craftiness, <S%G3834><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> handling <S%G1389><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> deceitfully; <S%G1389><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by the manifestation <S%G5321><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> commending <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%>'s conscience <S%G4893><s%> in the sight of <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Good News <S%G2098><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> veiled, <S%G2572><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> veiled <S%G2572><s%> in those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G2076><s%> perish; <S%G622><s%>

in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the god <S%G2316><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> has blinded <S%G5186><s%> <S%G1519><s%> the minds <S%G3540><s%> of the unbelieving, <S%G571><s%> that <S%G3361><s%> the light <S%G5462><s%> of the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> should not dawn <S%G826><s%> on them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we don't <S%G3756><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> as Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> as your <S%G5216><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' sake;

seeing <S%G3754><s%> it is God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Light <S%G5457><s%> will shine <S%G2989><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%>" who has shone <S%G2989><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> give the light <S%G5462><s%> of the knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> clay <S%G3749><s%> vessels, <S%G4632><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the exceeding greatness <S%G5236><s%> of the power <S%G1411><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> ourselves. <S%G2257><s%>

We are pressed <S%G2346><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> every side, <S%G3956><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> crushed; <S%G4729><s%> perplexed, <S%G639><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to despair; <S%G1820><s%>
pursued, <S%G1377><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> forsaken; <S%G1459><s%> struck down, <S%G2598><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> destroyed; <S%G622><s%>

always <S%G3842><s%> carrying <S%G4064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> the putting to death <S%G3500><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> may also <S%G2532><s%> be revealed <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> who live <S%G2198><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' sake, <S%G2443><s%> that the life <S%G2222><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> may be revealed <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

But <S%G2249><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> according to that <S%G2596><s%> which is written, <S%G1125><s%> "I believed, <S%G4100><s%> and therefore <S%G1352><s%> I spoke. <S%G2980><s%>" We <S%G4100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1352><s%> also we speak; <S%G2980><s%>

knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> will raise <S%G1453><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will present <S%G3936><s%> us with <S%G4862><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are for <S%G1223><s%> your sakes, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the grace, <S%G5485><s%> being multiplied <S%G4121><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the many, <S%G4119><s%> may <S%G4052><s%> cause the thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> to abound <S%G4052><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore we don't <S%G3756><s%> faint, <S%G1573><s%> but <S%G235><s%> though <S%G1487><s%> <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> outward <S%G1854><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is decaying, <S%G235><s%> yet our <S%G2257><s%> inward <S%G2081><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is renewed <S%G341><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> by <S%G2532><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> light <S%G1645><s%> affliction, <S%G2347><s%> which is for the moment, <S%G3910><s%> works <S%G2716><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G2596><s%> more and <S%G5236><s%> more <S%G1519><s%> exceedingly <S%G5236><s%> an eternal <S%G166><s%> weight <S%G922><s%> of glory; <S%G1391><s%>

while we <S%G2257><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> look <S%G4648><s%> at the things <S%G3588><s%> which are seen, <S%G991><s%> but <S%G235><s%> at the things <S%G3588><s%> which are <S%G991><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> seen. <S%G991><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> which are seen <S%G991><s%> are temporal, <S%G4340><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> which are <S%G991><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> seen <S%G991><s%> are eternal. <S%G166><s%>
